thread.section_title: Interhome - Holiday Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Interhome - Holiday Rentals | www.interhome.ie
thread.title: Joanna Swinnerton
thread.title_full: Interhome - Holiday Rentals reviewed by Joanna Swinnerton

author: Joanna Swinnerton
title: Joanna Swinnerton
text: I have booked with Interhome twice now and will do so again as the customer service is excellent. They respond promptly to requests and are available 24/7 by phone. They keep you informed with emails, but don't send too many communications, as other companies tend to do. The apartments are good value and well-maintained, and the local service (via a local agency) is efficient and reliable.
